metadata.synopsis: Player and Astarion met Sebastian, one of Astarion's victims, in Cazador's Prison. Astarion is shocked.

63.speaker: Astarion
63.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

16.speaker: Astarion
16.text: The children I can understand - leverage against their parents - but Sebastian?
16.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

14.speaker: Astarion
14.text: I should have known what Cazador was capable of. He's played us for such fools.
14.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

6.speaker: Astarion
6.text: Not just seven spawn to placate the devil. Seven spawn, and seven thousand souls bound to them in blood.
6.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

66.speaker: Astarion
66.text: Everyone who ever trusted me enough to let down their guard... Innocents, idiots, and the unlucky.
66.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

67.speaker: Astarion
67.text: It doesn't matter. I will need to sacrifice them all if I want to perform the ritual.
67.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

61.speaker: Player
61.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

32.speaker: Astarion
32.text: What's the point? They're as good as dead. I thought they were dead.
32.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

26.speaker: Astarion
26.text: If they are unleashed, they will cause incredible carnage. They will be ravenous. They must die. Better they serve a purpose.
26.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: In another life, you'd have led me to this crypt, and not that pretty clearing in the forest.
52.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

34.speaker: Astarion
34.text: Gods, I can't say you're wrong. I can only say I'm so glad we didn't meet then.
34.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

54.speaker: Astarion
54.text: I don't even want to think what would have happened to you...
54.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Don't avoid it. Face it. You would have killed me.
50.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Many of these people are just fools like me, who wanted to love you.
0.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

58.speaker: Astarion
58.text: Many of them are petty criminals, street drunkards and brothel-goers.

25.speaker: Astarion
25.text: But from time to time, there was a Sebastian...

55.speaker: Player
55.text: To care again is to live again. What now?
55.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: We have to kill Cazador. That has to come first.
3.context: NodeContext: Knows you're right, deep down.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: There's still hope for them. You got out. You got better.

8.speaker: Astarion
8.text: They're in a state far beyond anything that ever happened to me.

45.speaker: Astarion
45.text: Decades of hatred will have piled up inside of them. I can't even begin to imagine.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: This isn't you, Astarion. Not really.

47.speaker: Astarion
47.text: It should be. I don't want to be like them... They're pathetic, horrible...

22.speaker: Player
22.text: So you will kill them all, just because they remind you of yourself?

17.speaker: Astarion
17.text: They do not. That weakness in me is dead. It's dead. I have a higher purpose.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: It's your fault they're that way.

5.speaker: Astarion
5.text: Don't hate me. I just did what I had to. I swear, I did what I had to.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Show them the kindness you never saw. No one deserves this fate.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: In the moment they die, they will hate you as much as they hate him - you will never forget that.

20.speaker: Astarion
20.text: I know they will. I know I won't.

23.speaker: Astarion
23.text: We must find Cazador. This must end.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: It is Cazador's cruelty, not yours, to have kept them alive in this way.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: Don't think about them. Focus on yourself.

56.speaker: Astarion
56.text: Thank you... Yes... this will all be over soon.

29.speaker: Astarion
29.text: It's just sickening, seeing them again. I don't know what else.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: It's going to be glorious. You're almost worse than me.

33.speaker: Astarion
33.text: I feel ill. All the fools and villains who ever fell for my ploys... they're here.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: If what you've told me is true... that's a colossal sum of souls.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Did Sebastian hurt you in some way?

65.speaker: Astarion
65.text: He didn't do anything at all... I can't say the same of all my victims...

11.speaker: Astarion
11.text: But why, why does he need them alive? What possible use could they have in this ruined state?

35.speaker: Player
35.text: I have a horrible feeling about this.

30.speaker: Astarion
30.text: All the blood he demanded... I thought he was gorging himself on... He never could have finished half of it.

49.speaker: Astarion
49.text: He never let us drink, he never wanted us to know. I had no idea there was worse than drainage and death at his hand. I couldn't imagine.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: He didn't need them to feed on?

46.speaker: Astarion
46.text: I could care less about that... I wonder if they'll tear me apart for what I did...

9.speaker: Player
9.text: They're beasts now. Feral rats. Leave it.

4.speaker: Astarion
4.text: There's only one reason they'd all still be here... he must need them for the ritual.

51.speaker: Astarion
51.text: Each of the seven... we must have brought in a thousand over the decades...

44.speaker: Astarion
44.text: They're all lambs for his slaughter. And if I was to take his place... they'd all die by my hand.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: Are you going to be all right?

42.speaker: Astarion
42.text: I don't know anymore. I thought these people were drained and buried. They should be dead.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: It's grotesque. They're kept like animals.

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: And I thought the nests in the kennels were bad... This lurked below...
